title: Winsor & Newton Cotman Watercolor Paint Set, Field Pocket Set, 12 Half Pans w/ Brush, Sponge, Bottle
description: Winsor & Newton Cotman Water Colors are a range of water colors that are made to our normal high quality standards but costs are kept to an economical level by replacing some of the more costly pigments with less expensive alternatives. Each color has good transparency, excellent tinting strength and good working properties. This exclusive compact Field Box has been designed to be light-weight and fit snugly into the pocket while providing everything required for successful outdoor water color painting. Constructed in durable blue plastic, the Field Box includes: 12 Cotman Water Color half pans, a pocket brush, artists' sponge, 3 mixing areas, 35ml capacity water bottle, clip-on water container and an instructional leaflet. Colors included: Cadmium Red Pale Hue, Cadmium Yellow Hue, Cadmium Yellow Pale Hue, Alizarin Crimson Hue, Ultramarine, Cobalt Blue Hue, Sap Green, Viridian Hue, Burnt Umber, Yellow Ochre, Burnt Sienna and Chinese White.
